209b7(mdo sde): thug 'gyur ba yod min yang // mtshams gcod pa yang ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku te// gcig ci 'dra bar de bzhin kun// 
209b8(mdo sde): 'on kyang tha dad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos so so'i skye bo dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// tshig gi/ 
210a1(mdo sde): las kyis rab tu phye// sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te// chos kyi dbyings las byung yin yang // sangs rgyas zhing ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten
210a2(mdo sde): 'thun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam mi khyab// sems can gdul ba'i don gyi phyir// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug
210a3(mdo sde): yin// zag med yod pa ma yin yang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos la// zag pa med pa nyid gsung ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mkhyen pas de dag gnyis min yang
210a4(mdo sde): dus gsum dag ni rnams gzigs shing // gnyis kyi la du shes ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang // sangs rgyas// 
210a5(mdo sde): rig pa su 'dod pa// de ni chos dbyings zhus shig pa// 'i ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// skye ba med pa bzod pa/ sten pa// rtag tu yang dag rab tu mkhyen// mkhyen nas
210a6(mdo sde): rab tu ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rtag tu chos kyi dbyings mtshungs te// 'jug pa med cing 'byung med kyang // 'gro ba gnas pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni
210a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mi skye ba la gcig pa 'am// mang po yod pa ma yin yang // sna tshogs rim pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de dag
210a8(mdo sde): tha dad sku med kyang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams dpag med du// sku lus dag ni sprul mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// stong gsum bye ba brgya bgrangs pa// sangs
210b1(mdo sde): rgyas zhing du brjod bya ba// der ni skye ba ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de bzhin gshegs pas dus kun tu// chos ni gnas par rab mkhyen kyang // chos
210b2(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag med cing // skra lus dpag tu med min yang // dpag tu yod par ston mdzad pa// 'di
210b3(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos kyi dbyings la mchog med de// dus gsum dag tu stong nyid kyang // mchog gi chos rnams ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug
210b4(mdo sde): yin zhig pa med cing skyes med la// chos kyi dbyi ngas dang mnyam gyur kyang // bsreg pa'i bskal pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 
210b5(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings ni grub med de// de la ngo bo nyid med/ kyang // 'on kyang nges par 'byung ston pa// 'di ni 'ji ga rten 'thun 'jug yin// gzigs pa ci yang mi
210b6(mdo sde): mnga' la// lhag mthong gis ni gzigs gyur cing // lta ba thams cad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos rnams kun la byed pa po// shin tu
210b7(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin yang // byas dang ma byas ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mya ngan 'das dang na mkhar ni// rgyal ba bgrangs su ma chud kyang // khams
210b8(mdo sde): kyi grangs rnams ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// grangs med stobs rnams brnyes gyur la// mthu las nyams pa mi mnga' yang // zham ring ba dag
211a1(mdo sde): tshol mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// nams yang byis pa'i blo ldan dang // sangs rgyas 'dren pa mi mnga' yang // byis pa de dag
211a2(mdo sde): 'dul mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// yon tan ldan pa thams cad kyis// pha rol de bzhin gshegs byon yang // de la nga ni gzhan zhes pa// 'di
211a3(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mi skye ba ni rtag tu skye// de dag rgyu las 'byung min yang // ma rig rkyen gyis 'byung zhes pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rgyal
211a4(mdo sde): brnyed dang bkur bsti las// sgrib pa med pa nyid brnye/ sa la/ chog shes pa ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jigarten 'thun 'jug yin// gang na sems can 'dul yod
211a5(mdo sde): par snang ba der ni 'dren pa rnams// de dag spyod pa ston/ mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rig pa gsum gyi tshogs bsags te// rig pa bskyed par
211a6(mdo sde): nges pa ston// 'di la mthong ba ci yang med// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'jig rten sgron ma thams cad du// skye bo sag tu med pa 'dul// gleng gzhi dag kyang ston mdzad
211a7(mdo sde): pa 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'jig rten gsum po gang na yang // chos gang phung po gnas pa med// 'on kyang chos bsgrubs bka' stsal pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug
211a8(mdo sde): yin mtha' gsum gyi ni mthar skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams ston mdzad cing // sems can rnams la rab ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos rnams
211b1(mdo sde): kun gyi rgyud mkhyen nas// 'chi 'pho skye ba rnam spangs la// de dag thams cad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mi skye ba ni gang mthong ba// ma rig de ni ye shes
211b2(mdo sde): bgegs// rig pa bskyed par ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig yin yang // sems can yongasu smin bya'i phyir// 'byung ba dag ni
211b3(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur zhing // the tsom med la shes 'gyur ba// de dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong // 
211b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon gyi de gsungs nas// sras po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs// rab tu dga' zhing yid rangs te// / ston pa'i bka' la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa
211b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi rje su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu
211b6(mdo sde): chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas/ gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA/ a ba
211b7(mdo sde): ta ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
211b8(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
212a1(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dang
212a2(mdo sde): phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman gyis yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub seMs
212a3(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ zab cing brten pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting nge
212a4(mdo sde): 'dzin thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongasu 'grub pa'i ga/ zungs thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 
212a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu ra pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phya ga rgya gang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ bla na med
212a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges ste/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
212a7(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang / ma nges
212a8(mdo sde): par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
212b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu
212b2(mdo sde): dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro/ 
212b3(mdo sde): ba lta bu dang / 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
212b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang nga/ dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// 
212b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bya chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa/ bla na med pa'i
212b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang
212b7(mdo sde): po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes
212b8(mdo sde): kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu
213a1(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ 
213a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa/ 
213a3(mdo sde): yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da'
213a4(mdo sde): par 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched cher ba cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
213a5(mdo sde): gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa de dag 'da' bar bya ba snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon la
213a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam ste/ 'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na// 
213a7(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas/ dpag tshad brgyad bcur phyir ded de phul na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems
213a8(mdo sde): mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang / 'jig
213b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom
213b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis ste/ byugs kyi shing rta la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ 
213b3(mdo sde): bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
213b4(mdo sde): srul pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang da dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ theg pa
213b5(mdo sde): chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing bsten la bsnyen bkur byed cing / de/ 
213b6(mdo sde): dag lhan cig du 'dris par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan
213b7(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha don byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i
213b8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go// byang chub sems dpa'
214a1(mdo sde): de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po/ shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang / de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i
214a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la zhig mig nad kyis mig zum par gyur nas/ de mig
214a3(mdo sde): dbye ba dang gzums su rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te/ zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/ de'i dgra 'am mi 'dza' ba/ 
214a4(mdo sde): gzhan zhig gis/ byi phyi ling gi phye ma spar gang gis mi dag bkang nas/ de yang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub
214a5(mdo sde): kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang / de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
214a6(mdo sde): pa bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin
214a7(mdo sde): par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la zhig
214a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du
214b1(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan
214b2(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la
214b3(mdo sde): zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos/ de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam
214b4(mdo sde): du sems/ glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i mi des/ de skal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bska dal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med
214b5(mdo sde): nga med pa sa kya/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'dar bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ com ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// 
214b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi des/ bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal ba stong ngam/ bskal pa
214b7(mdo sde): bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lagaso// 
214b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
215a1(mdo sde): bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa bdag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag dang lhan cig tu
215a2(mdo sde): 'dris par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
215a3(mdo sde): klog cing kha don byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog du 'jug par byed cing / kha ton byed du 'jug la yongs su spyod par byed du 'jug na/ nyan thos kyi theg
215a4(mdo sde): pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed/ dpa des/ shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing bzlog go// byang
215a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang
215a6(mdo sde): yin pa de yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na/ shing
215a7(mdo sde): gi sdong po chen po srid du dpag tshad stong pa zhig yod la/ de yang rgya mtsho chen pos khyer ba las/ bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis/ de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las
215a8(mdo sde): phyir phul te bzlog nas/ de la lcags kyi gar bu dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ shing gi sdong po chen po rgya mtsho chen po la
215b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'am/ sems can bsgral pa'i phyir spyad par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
215b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po yang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
215b3(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor yang
215b4(mdo sde): 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jam dpal 'a di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro
215b5(mdo sde): ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal
215b6(mdo sde): dper na/ mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched
215b7(mdo sde): che rab cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma
215b8(mdo sde): la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs
216a1(mdo sde): nang 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa
216a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rdo thog lag so// bde bar gshegs pa yun ring mo zhig gis rngo thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi
216a3(mdo sde): bu'amar rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi
216a4(mdo sde): theg pa pa dag la mi snyen cing mi sten la bsnyen bkur mi byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris bar mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ 
216a5(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag/ sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan/ thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha don mi byed/ sems
216a6(mdo sde): par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog du 'jug par mi byed/ kha don byed du 'jug par mi byed de// de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog
216a7(mdo sde): la gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston na// 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal dper na/ nam
216a8(mdo sde): mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin duH/ 
216b1(mdo sde): pab dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / lang tsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa yang
216b2(mdo sde): 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnamasu ston par byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub
216b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ 
216b4(mdo sde): der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che ba cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu/ 
216b5(mdo sde): zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ste ma mo// de 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de/ 
216b6(mdo sde): dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
216b7(mdo sde): mi des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo thog lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
216b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg
217a1(mdo sde): pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa padag la mi bsnyen mi bsten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig
217a2(mdo sde): tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos
217a3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha don mi byed dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha don byed
217a4(mdo sde): du 'jug par mi byed de/ gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing / de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub seMs
217a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas pa byed cing / der gzho
217a6(mdo sde): der 'bab/ der bab na de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la spen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/ 
217a7(mdo sde): de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed la/ de theg pa chen po yongasu tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ 
217a8(mdo sde): mar me dang bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/ de theg pa chen po klog cing kha don byed la/ dga'
217b1(mdo sde): ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bog par byed/ ma slabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang gsong por smra la/ tshig
217b2(mdo sde): mi brlang mi gtum mi rtsub pa dang / dga' ba dang / snyan par smra zhing / de srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong la/ de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
217b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams la ci nus ci lcogs kyis/ snying nas lhag pa'i bsam pas yongasu 'dzin par byed// 
217b4(mdo sde): de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par mi byed la / de sngon ma byung ba dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnam ngas tshol ba'i rang bzhin can yin zhing / gang dag las thos
217b5(mdo sde): pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan byang chub sems/ dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par
217b6(mdo sde): mi byed la/ nyes pa bden pa dang / mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed la/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yang mi tshol zhing / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
217b7(mdo sde): bsnyoms la slob pa 'di ni/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ba yin pa rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de
217b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der
218a1(mdo sde): yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu
218a2(mdo sde): zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs/ 
218a3(mdo sde): pa la gsol ba gdab par gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas/ gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
218a4(mdo sde): lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kha// mas 'da' bar 'tshal te der yang bdag gis pa/ gyi ba dang / bgyi ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / 
218a5(mdo sde): ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig mchis na/ bcom ldan des kyis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
218a6(mdo sde): gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad/ 
218a7(mdo sde): spyod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyod lags so// bde bar gshegs pa spyod lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs
218a8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
218b1(mdo sde): pa dag la mi snyen mi sten cing / bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gcu
218b2(mdo sde): lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha don mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na
218b3(mdo sde): tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog du 'jug par mi byed/ kha don byed du 'jug par mi byed/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog/ gang kha don byed pa de yang theg pa chen po
218b4(mdo sde): kho na kha don byed/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing / de lus dang ngag dang yid yongasu dag la/ tshul khrims dang / ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin la/ gzhan
218b5(mdo sde): ngag kyang lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa la 'gro// tshul khrims dang dge ba'i chos can la 'god/ ga pa chen po la zhugs par byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 
218b6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par byed la der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der 'bab cing de dag dang lhan cig
218b7(mdo sde): tu gnas te/ de dag la snyen cing sten la/ bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag
218b8(mdo sde): khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ de theg pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing 'dug la 'chang bar byed/ mar mo dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / 
219a1(mdo sde): blug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par byed de/ theg pa chen po klog cing kha don byed la gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos
219a2(mdo sde): klog du 'jug cing / kha don byed du 'jug/ ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi bskyed la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god/ 
219a3(mdo sde): par byed/ de bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra la/ gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba la 'god de tshig mi brlang mi gtum mi rtsub la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god cing
219a4(mdo sde): de dga' ba dang snyan par smra la/ srog gi phyir yang theg pa che/ ngan po mi spong zhing / de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang
219a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa drag rdo dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen
219a6(mdo sde): po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed/ de sngon ma byung ba dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams gus pa drag bro/ 
219a7(mdo sde): don du gnyer zhing tshol ba dang / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu bskyed par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i
219a8(mdo sde): spyod pa la ma bslabs pa rnams la yang rlom sems mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed/ nyes pa gzhan dag gis 'khrul pa yang mi tshol/ gzhan
219b1(mdo sde): ngag kyang bslab pa kho na la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i las chus zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chung pos
219b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sem
219b3(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la dgod par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ 
219b4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos de'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god pa ra byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chung bos pa'i sems
219b5(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag tu nga byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems kyi na gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub
219b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can
219b7(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems
219b8(mdo sde): dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
220a1(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chung bos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
220a2(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chung
220a3(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
220a4(mdo sde): byed lang gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dag rab dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi kham des la rnam par lta ba la 'dod par byed/ de bgo ba shi' rang
220a5(mdo sde): bzhin can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bgo ba shi'i rang bzhi na can la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
220a6(mdo sde): byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khas
220a7(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bcings pas bcings pa'i sems
220a8(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bcings pas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems
220b1(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i
220b2(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
220b3(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la
220b4(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas gnyid kyi log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas
220b5(mdo sde): gnyid log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par/ lta ba la 'god par byed/ de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i/ mas can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
220b6(mdo sde): dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la
220b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khas
220b8(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos kyi spyod pa chud zos
221a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ 
221a2(mdo sde): de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems
221a3(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po la
221a4(mdo sde): mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par dalta ba la 'god par byed/ de tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chu/ dad zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
221a5(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i se mas can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems
221a6(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed do// de bzod pa dang nges pa
221a7(mdo sde): chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyi bzod pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de'i gnas
221a8(mdo sde): dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
221b1(mdo sde): par byed/ de sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par
221b2(mdo sde): sdom pa dang / nges pa chud zos pa'i seman gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
221b3(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de pha rol tu phyin
221b4(mdo sde): pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can dgyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kya dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos
221b5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi rigasu skye ba chud zos pa'i sem sa can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
221b6(mdo sde): dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigasu skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dge ba'i gshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
221b7(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i gshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud
221b8(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par
222a1(mdo sde): byed de chos la rton pa chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par/ 
222a2(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/ de ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
222a3(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang don la rton pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
222a4(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de nges pa'i/ don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang
222a5(mdo sde): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems na gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
222a6(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bden pa'i chos dang don dang 'dul
222a7(mdo sde): ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang don dang 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed/ de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed// 
222a8(mdo sde): cing gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de 'jig rten thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag
222b1(mdo sde): ni mgon med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni skyabs med pa sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gling med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gnas med pa/ sems
222b2(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na/ kye ma nam zhig ni bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhig gu/ skyabs su 'gyur zhig gu/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhig gu/ gling du
222b3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhig gu/ gnas su 'gyur zhig gu/ skyob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o// 'jam dpal dper na/ bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding lang tse dang stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa de ni
222b4(mdo sde): 'dod na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// dajam dpal de de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang / 
222b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / mgyogs pa dang / shugs dang / brtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa der yang
222b6(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur la/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skabs dang / dpung gnyen dang gling dang gnas dang / skyob par yang 'gyur pa
222b7(mdo sde): de ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ 
222b8(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin cig bzhin du/ lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang
223a1(mdo sde): ldan pa phul zhing / lha'i nabaza' dag kyang phul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang nyin cig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po/ 
223a2(mdo sde): che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas nas/ sbyin pa byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis
223a3(mdo sde): ning sems can gcig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
223a4(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ 
223a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa
223a6(mdo sde): bskyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can
223a7(mdo sde): thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de ba
223a8(mdo sde): ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi/ 
223b1(mdo sde): rdul skyed kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na/ 
223b2(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
223b3(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan dag gis ni/ sems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag na/ 
223b4(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang da la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
223b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can tham sa cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can
223b6(mdo sde): gcig ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
223b7(mdo sde): zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs
223b8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 
224a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad/ glang po che'i shing rtas 'a
224a2(mdo sde): ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 
224a3(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
224a4(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ zla ba dang nyi ma su 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems
224a5(mdo sde): can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i bya/ byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches/ bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal
224a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul
224a7(mdo sde): gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu'i
224a8(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med paskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
224b1(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal
224b2(mdo sde): pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabasu song ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ 
224b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gcig la/ nyin cig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
224b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'ji dag rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul ste da kyi dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song ba
224b5(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba stan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos
224b6(mdo sde): dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ gang zag brgyad pa la nyin gcig zan gcig byin
224b7(mdo sde): na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
224b8(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi gang zag brgyad pa rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i
225a1(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig phan gcig byin na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod
225a2(mdo sde): nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun tu
225a3(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
225a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir / dang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni/ dbas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal
225a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la/ 
225a6(mdo sde): nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
225a7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya
225a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis
225a9(mdo sde): mas kyi bu'am rigs thum gzhan zhig gis ni/ phyir ma 'ong ba gcig la gcin cig gnagacig zani cig byin na/ 'di ni de das ches bsod namam grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dathal
225b1(mdo sde): ni/ dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gri
225b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du/ lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang / 
225b3(mdo sde): byin te de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni
225b4(mdo sde): de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhi ngag gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
225b5(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang
225b6(mdo sde): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 
225b7(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe/ gang dang gang la brtsams te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i
225b8(mdo sde): tshe des sems de la mi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci yang med la/ des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung ba med pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
226a1(mdo sde): ni yon tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal dper na/ bya'i rgyal po ka la bing ka'i sgro nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig ma bye ba dag gis
226a2(mdo sde): kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po'i sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig
226a3(mdo sde): pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i rab rib kyis bris yog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su sngo ba'i sbyor ba bsgrub pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs
226a4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do// 'jam da pal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
226a5(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin gci ga bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i
226a6(mdo sde): gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i
226a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
226a8(mdo sde): gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas
226b1(mdo sde): ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ zla ba dang nyi mas
226b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
226b3(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin gcig
226b4(mdo sde): bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos pa ga kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
226b5(mdo sde): mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro/ lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod
226b6(mdo sde): nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan
226b7(mdo sde): thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal
226b8(mdo sde): pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
227a1(mdo sde): gcig la/ nyin gcig panacig byinan/ 'dzi ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpa la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang ma lams/ 
227a2(mdo sde): gisang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin gcig
227a3(mdo sde): bzhin du lha'i bas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ 
227a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches paradad na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med pa skye do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
227a5(mdo sde): la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha mas cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du ba cug la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi
227a6(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas la/ nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i
227a7(mdo sde): stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal
227a8(mdo sde): po'i dra bas bkab pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos byugs pa/ me tog man 'da' ra ba dang / man 'da' ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / 
227b1(mdo sde): man dzu sha ka chen po dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / ta ra ni bar na dang / go ta ra ni dang / dri mchog dang / d+hu nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang / ud pa la dang pad+ma
227b2(mdo sde): dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed du bcug te/ rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang
227b3(mdo sde): byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am/ thams cad mkhyen
227b4(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba'i sgra thos sam/ ri mor bris pa mthong ngam/ gzug/ sa su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
227b5(mdo sde): grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang sor mo bcu'i tha la mo sbyar ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bso da nams grangs med pa skyed do// gang mar me 'am/ 
227b6(mdo sde): bdug pa 'am/ me tog gam/ spos 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ tha na de'i yon tan bsngags pa cig tsam brjod na yang / 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/ longs
227b7(mdo sde): spyod chen po 'grub par byed cing / mthar gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na/ chu'i thigs pa chung ngu rgya mtsho chen por song ba yang / 
227b8(mdo sde): srog pa'i bskal pa'i me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung
228a1(mdo sde): pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad pa 'am/ mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
228a2(mdo sde): dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar chung yang 'di lta ste/ bong dang khyon dang / che bas skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lhang nger 'dug cing kun tu
228a3(mdo sde): lhang nger 'dug go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba yang 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas dge
228a4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang nger 'a da dug go/ 'jam dpal de ltar na/ de bzhin dgashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
228a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang lA na no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs
228a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 
228a7(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing / lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang
228a8(mdo sde): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod
228b1(mdo sde): nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ ston par byed pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par
228b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
228b3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag gis zas dang gos bcad la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byad
228b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i zan cig phrogs sam/ zan cig gtsodad du bcug na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'das pa
228b5(mdo sde): dang rnga ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
228b6(mdo sde): gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas/ yang dag par bsgribs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i
228b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes pa'i sems can la/ kham gcig tsam yongs su btang ba dang / 
228b8(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal nan gyi dper byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te sdang
229a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par
229a2(mdo sde): grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po med par byas la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po
229a3(mdo sde): la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig blangs pa tsam yang med par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
229a4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po
229a5(mdo sde): dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ni/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems
229a6(mdo sde): dpa' ni tha na nyi ma gcig gi bslab pa gcig las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam
229a7(mdo sde): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar
229a8(mdo sde): du 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te/ gnod sems kyi sems kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
229b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la khros te/ gnod sems kyi sems
229b2(mdo sde): kyis 'di dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
229b3(mdo sde): zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ khros te gnod
229b4(mdo sde): sems kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la blta/ das na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal nan gyis dper bya na/ gal te phyogs
229b5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can tha mas cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur la/ de na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ byams pa'i
229b6(mdo sde): sems kyis mig bskyed la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig ni/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ dga' ba'i sems kyis bltas na/ 'di ni
229b7(mdo sde): de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems
229b8(mdo sde): can thams cad btson ra na 'dug pa las/ btson ra nas thar par byas nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bde ba la bkod cing / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bde ba la yang bkod la/ 
230a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis mthong bar 'dod cing
230a2(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems kyis de'i sngags pa brjod na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i
230a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems
230a4(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig tsam 'phel bar byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal theg pa chen po la
230a5(mdo sde): mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sem sa can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ theg
230a6(mdo sde): pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phung po med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'don du bcug
230a7(mdo sde): nang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal nan gyi dper bya na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
230a8(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnamasu skyes par byas la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
230b1(mdo sde): bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs
230b2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la/ byang chub kyi sems
230b3(mdo sde): las mos pa bzlog la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ tha na theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig theg pa chen po las mos pa bzlog ma
230b4(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dang/ da la gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams dacad kyi sems can thams cad/ sems can dmyal ba dang / 
230b5(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ga ngal la zhig gis/ sems can de dag thams cad sems
230b6(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton nas/ byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig theg pa
230b7(mdo sde): chen po la mos pa la 'jug par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
230b8(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams/ rang sangs rgyas las nyams par byas la/ gcig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig/ 
231a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las nyams par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med paskyed do// 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
231a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snyed pa dang / bkur bsti bcad pa'i phyir/ rnyed pa dang bkur bstil ser sna'i sems bskyed cing / phyogs dang / 
231a3(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams rnams su de dag gi grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa bsgrags la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ theg pa
231a4(mdo sde): chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi rnye dad pa dang / bkur bsti bcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang bkur dang sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing / bsngags pa ma
231a5(mdo sde): yin pa bsgrags na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grang / sa med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal gang la la zhig / sa dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ theg pa
231a6(mdo sde): chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis/ tha na chu ra'i chu tsam byin na yang / las des de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma myong bar 'gyur/ 
231a7(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa la mos pa lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de
231a8(mdo sde): ngag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado// / 
231b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa nges pa dang / ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgyu gar gyi mkhan po brad dz+nyA ba ma/ 
231b2(mdo sde): dang su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ gtan la bab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha ga ba te b+hai Sha dz+ya gu ru bai dUr+ya pra b+ha s+ya pUrba pra Ni d+ha ne biste
231b3(mdo sde): ran nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang
231b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byon te/ yangs
231b5(mdo sde): pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sum khri
231b6(mdo sde): drug stong dang yang thabs gcig tu/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
231b7(mdo sde): po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig
231b8(mdo sde): tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
232a1(mdo sde): 'o gang thos pas sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su blang bar 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i cha spang ma'i dus dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'bru
232a2(mdo sde): pa nang sems can de dag rje su bzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ 
232a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin ste/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod ni snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 
232a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed na/ das/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / 
232a5(mdo sde): phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni ma nga legs so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par/ rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// 'jam
232a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
232a7(mdo sde): to 'jam dpal shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yar snang ba rje
232a8(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
232b1(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das
232b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po 'di dag btab bo// bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ de'i smon
232b3(mdo sde): lam chen po dang po ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi lus kyi 'od
232b4(mdo sde): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med cing / dadapag gis mi lang ba dag lam me lhan ne lhang nger gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i
232b5(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya da cus legs par brgyan par gyur te/ bdag ci dra ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar
232b6(mdo sde): gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
232b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ lus nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med la 'od gsal ba dang
232b8(mdo sde): kho lag yangs shing rgya che ba dang / dpal dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / legs par gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par
233a1(mdo sde): brgyan par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu skyes pa dag dang / gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na/ mtshan mo mun pa mun gnas
233a2(mdo sde): gi nang na phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag bdag gi 'od kyis phyogs dga' dgur 'gro bar gyur cig/ las rnams kyang byed par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsu
233a3(mdo sde): pab ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na bdag gi
233a4(mdo sde): shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pas sems can gyi khams dpag gis mi lang bar dag longs daspyod mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur te/ su yang cis kyang
233a5(mdo sde): brel ba med par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ong/ so pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
233a6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o// 
233a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi lam du zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la gzud par bya'o zhes btab bo// de'i smon lam
233a8(mdo sde): chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na
233b1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag bdag gi gnan tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sems can gzhan dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi ming thos nas
233b2(mdo sde): bdag gi mthus sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams po dang / tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig/ su yang tshul khrims log par zhugs te/ ngan par 'gro bar ma gyur cig ces
233b3(mdo sde): btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe// 
233b4(mdo sde): bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag lus ngan pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / bems po dang / yan lag skyon can dang / sgur po dang
233b5(mdo sde): sha bkra can dang / zhar ba dang / long ba dang 'on pa dang / smyo na bar gyur pa dang / gzhan yang gang dag lus la nad/ kyis btab pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas/ thad
233b6(mdo sde): dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
233b7(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag nad sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir ba skyabs med pa/ mgon med pa/ 'tshog
233b8(mdo sde): chas dang / sman mi bdag pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal ba gang dag gi rna lam du bdag gi ming grag pa de dag nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi
234a1(mdo sde): mthar thug gi bar du nang med cing / gnod pa med par gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
234a2(mdo sde): nang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ bud med gang la la bud med kyi skyon brgya dag gis kun nas
234a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs par gyur pa/ bud med kyi dngos po la spyod pa/ bud med kyi skye gnas las yong su thar par 'dod pa de dag bud med kyi dngos po las log par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug
234a4(mdo sde): gi bar du skyes pa'i dbang po 'byung bar gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po dgu pa ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
234a5(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa ni/ sems can tham sa cad bdud kyi zhags pa rnams las yongs su thar par
234a6(mdo sde): bya'o lta ba tha dad pa mi 'thun pazang gzing bas mi 'thun par gyur pa dag/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par bya'o// mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan par bya'o zhes
234a7(mdo sde): btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bcu pa ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i cha/ 
234a8(mdo sde): bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang gang dag bcings pa dang brdeg pa dang go rar gzhug pa dang / gsad par 'os pa du mas kun tu
234b1(mdo sde): gtses pa/ nga rgyal dang bral ba/ lus dang / ngag dag sems sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa de dag/ bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthus/ gnod pa thams cad las yong su thar par gyur cig
234b2(mdo sde): ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bcu gcig pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i
234b3(mdo sde): tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag bkres pa dang / skom pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba/ kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa/ sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag bdag gis kha
234b4(mdo sde): dog dang / dri dang ror ldan pa'i kha zas kyis lus tshim par byas te/ phyis chos kyi ros shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa
234b5(mdo sde): de'i smon lam chen po bcu gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe/ bad ga ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
234b6(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ sems can gang su sgren mo bgo ba med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myod/ 
234b7(mdo sde): bapa de dag la bdag gis gos yongasu spyad pa tshon sna tshogs su kha bsgyur ba dag sbyin par bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / sprad pa dang / phreng ba dang / 
234b8(mdo sde): spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab bo// 'jam
235a1(mdo sde): dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ 
235a2(mdo sde): pa nang smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po de dag btab par gyur to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i smon lam gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
235a3(mdo sde): tan bkod pa gang yin pa de ni/ bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa'i yang zad par byar mi nuso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongasu dag pa ste/ rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo// 
235a4(mdo sde): med pa rnga 'dod pa'i skyon med pa/ ngan song dang / sdug bsgra dal gyi sgra med pa/ bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ sa da dang / rtsig pa dang / ra ba dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi
235a5(mdo sde): dra ba dang / ba ga ma ni bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin can/ pu shu ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can te 'jig rten gyi kha mas bde ba can ci 'dra ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa
235a6(mdo sde): DUR+Ya ra snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang de dang 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag gi nang na/ byang chub seMs
235a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gtso bo gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/ gnyis pa'i ming ni zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya ste/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
235a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba
235b1(mdo sde): smon lam thob shig/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can so so'i skye bo gang dag dge ba dang / mi dge ba mi shes
235b2(mdo sde): pa dag yod de/ de dag ni chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi shes pa'o// de dag ni byis pa glen pa dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba/ nor sogs
235b3(mdo sde): shing bsrung ba la mngon par brtson gyi/ sbyin pa yang dag par bged pa la de dag gi sems mi 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ rang gi lus kyi sha las bcad pa bzhin
235b4(mdo sde): du/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag/ ni bdag nyid kyang du ma yongasu mi spyod na/ pha ma dang / chung ma dang bu dang / bu mo la mi ster ba lta smos kyang ci
235b5(mdo sde): dgos/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa rnams dang / gzhan slong ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can de lta bu de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos na yi
235b6(mdo sde): dgas kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na dud 'gro'i skye gan su skye bar 'gyur ro// de la gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i
235b7(mdo sde): 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung / dud 'gro'i skye gnas na kyang rung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur zhing / 
235b8(mdo sde): dran ma thag pa tsam gyis de nas shi 'phos nas/ yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas skrag nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan da / 
236a1(mdo sde): na du ma gnyer ba dang / sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yang su gtong ba rgyu
236a2(mdo sde): te rims kyis rang gi mgo dang / lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang / sha dang khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/ nor gyi phung po gzhan lta smos kyang cing dgos/ 
236a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i gnas 'jig pa dag yod do// de dag tshul khrims log par zhugs shing / lta ba log par
236a4(mdo sde): zhugs nas gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni/ tshul khrims srung gi mang du thos pa yongasu mi la te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams
236a5(mdo sde): kyi don zab mo mi shes/ gang dag mang du thos pa de dag ni lU/ ga pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/ nga rgyal gyis non/ bas/ gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang
236a6(mdo sde): za bar 'gyur/ spong bar 'gyuraro// mi blun po de lta bu de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa ste/ bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la/ sems can gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang
236a7(mdo sde): g.yangs sa chen por lhung bar byed pa'o// sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
236a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang der sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur
